titles.main_title: A SIMPLE GAME IN THE GALAXY...
titles.main_title_lower: A simple game in the galaxy...
titles.question_intro: Simple questions, simple answers, simple if you know !
titles.identity_intro: Do you know your favorite characters as well as you claim to ?
titles.daily_intro: 4 questions and 2 characters every day, the same for everyone !

questions.wrong_answer_prompt: Too bad, you're wrong this time...
questions.help_message: Answer only with the requested word(s), without any determiner, plural and so on.

identity.new_character_message: Well done... You try a new one ?
identity.noob: You'll do better with the next one...
identity.help_message:
Choose one category, fill every active field with the requested year (watch out for the era !) or proper name then choose all needed affiliations.
You can check your answers as many times as you want. As long as don't stop guessing, it'll be considered as true.

daily.score_noob_questions: You should play a little more in questions mode to get this better...
daily.score_perfect_questions: Do you know the Wookiee by heart ? Well done !
daily.score_noob_identity: You shouldn't focus on starships only while watching movies...
daily.score_good_identity: Drink one glass less at the cantina and it'll be perfect !
daily.score_perfect_identity: You come back from a galaxy far, far away ? Well done !

intro.title: Not so long ago, in a galaxy very, very close...
intro.message: ... I decided to take advantage of an opportunity to create the little Star Wars game I'd have loved to play. Two game modes, easy to understand but of a level worthy of our passion, and a system of daily challenges to measure yourself against others. I hope you'll like it and may the Force be with you !

loading.title: Loading
loading.precision: It can take up to one minute.
